infotexts.entitydescription.effect_trigger_radiati: Gives off radiation within a 10m radius when active.Takes walls, doors and character distance from the center into account.\nRadiation and contamination per second at the center: 0.5\nCan be wired to turn it on/off.

Gives off radiation within a 10m radius when active.
Takes walls, doors and character distance from the center into account.
Radiation and contamination per second at the center: 1.0
Can be wired to turn it on/off.

Gives off radiation within a 10m radius when active.
Takes walls, doors and character distance from the center into account.
Radiation and contamination per second at the center: 1.5
Can be wired to turn it on/off.
